name: DEVASTABLANCE. Last Day. Prologue
description:
The game is not trying to offend or offend anyone! All coincidences with real life and real history are random!


1 . Basic information
Platform: PC
Genres: Top down shooter, 2D, science fiction, post-apocalyptic.
Lecture hall: 12+
Engine: Godot Engine 3.5
Mode: Single-user
Stylistics: 2D, pixel graphics
Language: English, Russian
Payment Model: Free

2. Description

Devastblance. Last Day. Prologue is the prologue of a larger Devastablance game. Last Day.(an offshoot of the “Devastablnce” series of games) The game is a pixel 2d top down shooter.

The game will have various mechanics, such as: changing weapons, items, etc. 

Plot: The game takes place in a secret laboratory, the main characters perform the task of the group 'scavengers', they must find 3 artifacts: a blue panacea, a golden ball, a ruby of power. The story tells the beginning of the enmity between the main character and the main villain. The main character is called Bullet. The game will be free with the possibility of donation

Movement - W A S D
Map - M
Quit - Escape
Pause - TAB
Interaction with objects - E
Shooting - LMB
Ctrl - Dash
Shift - Run

The world, once in balance between spiritual and material realities, has collapsed into the abyss of war. In a fit of anger, people used the most terrible creation of material reality. But because of the greed of the lords of spiritual reality, nuclear bombs hit not only the abode of spirituality, but also the material territory. Being the head of the scavengers association, which tries to reverse the consequences of the terrible mistakes of its ancestors, desperately trying to restore the balance of material and spiritual realities. People were divided into groups that adhered to their goals, ideals and philosophy. You have good public speaking skills and have little influence, but if it weren't for the huge mountain system around your camp, scavengers would no longer exist. You continue to believe in your opinion, promote it, prove that you are right and... But understand, because all this is a game and you are a speck of dust on the field of confrontation with established ideals, philosophy and opinions. But know, even a butterfly can change the world, so you can...
